snippet: The Stifel Financial Corporation agreed on Monday to buy the investment banking firm KBW Inc., acquiring a 50-year-old concern known for its role as an adviser to the financial services industry.
abstract: The Stifel Financial Corporation agreed on Monday to buy the investment banking firm KBW Inc., acquiring a 50-year-old concern known for its role as an adviser to the financial services industry.

byline.original: By PETER LATTMAN and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: In Combination of Services, Stifel Financial to Buy KBW for $575 Million
headline.print_headline: In Combination of Services, Stifel Financial to Buy KBW for $575 Million
